author: Sudiksha Kochi
description: The father of 20-year-old National Guard member Sarah Beckstrom, who was shot near the White House the day before Thanksgiving, said that she has a “mortal wound." Beckstrom, along with fellow National Guard member 24-year-old Andrew Wolfe, were shot near the Farragut Square Metro Station in the area of 17th and I streets NW at...
title: Father of National Guard member shot in DC says 'she has a mortal wound'

author: Sudiksha Kochi
description: A federal judge late Wednesday ordered the Trump administration to provide a description of the materials it intends to publicly release about the late convicted sex offender Jeffrey Epstein. U.S. District Judge Richard Berman in his order requested “a detailed description of the privacy process, including any redactions, the Government seeks to employ to protect...
title: Judge seeks protections for Epstein victims exposed in file disclosures

author: Sudiksha Kochi
description: Republicans on Capitol Hill are calling for more immigration restrictions after two National Guard members were shot on Wednesday by an Afghan national in the nation's capital — not far from the White House. The CIA said the suspect, 29-year-old Rahmanullah Lakanwal, worked for the agency in Afghanistan prior to the U.S. withdrawal from the...
title: Republicans 'outraged' over National Guard shooting press for immigration crackdown

author: Sudiksha Kochi
description: The Chilean national accused of stealing Department of Homeland Security (DHS) Secretary Kristi Noem’s purse earlier this year pleaded guilty last week to charges of wire fraud, aiding and abetting and first-degree theft, and he may now be subject to deportation. The suspect, identified as Mario Bustamante Leiva, allegedly committed several thefts across Washington, D.C.,...
title: Man accused of stealing Kristi Noem's purse pleads guilty

author: Fabio Richter, opinion contributor
description: Today, industrial logic has not only mechanized bread, but also the bonds that once gathered around it.
title: How we learned to industrialize everything, including each other

author: Jos Joseph, opinion contributor
description: Thanksgiving has become a political mess, but it is still a time to give thanks for the fact that we are able to survive in tough times and for those who will help us get through those tough times.
title: ’Tis the season of unaffordability, which makes Thanksgiving as important as ever

author: The Hill Staff
description: The 2025 Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade is underway in New York City as Americans prepare for a busy holiday season. Last year's parade was partially interrupted by pro-Palestinian protestors demonstrating against the Israel-Hamas war in Gaza. This year? Consumer boycotts are expected over Trump administration policies — including increased prices, sweeping tariffs and rollbacks of...
title: Photos: 2025 Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade in New York City

author: Meg Hilling
description: The boycott, known as “We Ain’t Buying It,” is asking consumers to hit pause on buying from major corporations.
title: Consumer boycotts planned for Thanksgiving through Cyber Monday

author: Nolan Rappaport, opinion contributor
description: The immigration court is in the midst of a backlog crisis.
title: How legal are Trump’s expedited removal proceedings for aliens in the country illegally?

author: Teddy Grant
description: Jamie Lee Curtis, who hasn’t shied away from sharing her political views, called out the president for his "vile" behavior.
title: Jamie Lee Curtis breaks down in tears comparing Trump to Princess Diana

author: Spencer Gustafson
description: It was originally known as the Macy's Christmas Parade as an effort to give holiday sales a boost for the new Macy's store, according to the Library of Congress. On Nov. 27, 1924, the tradition began and has only gotten bigger every year since.
title: Photos: Macy's Thanksgiving Day Parade through the decades

author: Rob Taub
description: According to the Calorie Control Council, many Americans eat around 3,150 calories at a feast.
title: How many calories are in the average thanksgiving dinner?

author: Brett Samuels
description: President Trump said Wednesday his administration would review the cases of individuals from Afghanistan who entered the United States during the Biden administration. Trump's announcement came hours after two National Guard troops were shot in Washington, D.C. Trump said the suspected shooter is an Afghan national who entered the country during the Biden administration. "We must...
title: Trump directs review of Afghans who entered US under Biden after National Guard shooting

author: Ryan Mancini
description: A federal judge in Colorado ruled on Tuesday that immigration officers, without a warrant but with probable cause, can arrest people whom they deem likely to flee from custody. The ruling comes as a result of a lawsuit brought by the American Civil Liberties Union (ACLU) of Colorado and other lawyers that alleges four migrants,...
title: Judge: Immigration officers in Colorado can only arrest those likely to flee
